EmailTemplate.name: Series Sign-up.Webinar Series Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Webinar Series Sign-up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Independent Consultant}},
Thank you for registering to receive communications about Webinar series. We will notify you of each Webinar and provide a link for you to register.
To view our past webinars, visit our resources page <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources>. ___________________________________ MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6000 e: info@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
